ygData.subject: Testament of Vinear
ygData.msgSnippet: I am looking for some information regarding this +10 wis/mana book quest. I have heard that you have to start it in Erudin in the library. Does anybody know
ygData.messageBody:
I am looking for some information regarding this +10 wis/mana book quest. I
have heard that you have to start it in Erudin in the library. Does anybody
know the persons name. Any other tips and tricks would be great. And if
anybody knows what kinda level you should be for this quest that would be
great. I better start practicing my 1hblunt that I havent used since 8th
level.

Chrisstauf of the Lightbringers
Cleric of the 18th circle
Karana server
